StoryText: My sister sneaks out of the house and sneaks back in and needs me to distract my parents so she can return to her room unnoticed.
Question: What do I do?

OptionText.Text: Tell her I’m not going to help her
I will try to distract parents by asking a question about homework
I will try to distract parents by telling them a funny joke I heard

OptionResult.Result: My sister tries to sneak in but my parents catch her and she gets mad at me but my parents are happy I didn’t cover for her.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: My sister gets annoyed with me for not covering for her but I didn’t want to get in trouble too! My parents were happy with me, but it’s upsetting my sister got so mad at me. I didn’t tell her to sneak out in the first place!

OptionResult.Result: My parents tell me to ask my sister since she knows more about this subject at which point they find out she snuck out and ground us both.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Our parents get mad at us and ground us both since I was trying to cover for my sister and it failed miserably! But my sister and I bond and she appreciates me trying.

OptionResult.Result: The distraction works! My sister gets back into her room unnoticed and she is so grateful she even gives me some cash!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: My funny joke served as a great distraction and my sister avoided getting in trouble! And the cash she gave me was a nice touch... hm, maybe I have stumbled across a new part-time job.
